channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: A manhunt is under way after two students were killed and nine others injured in a mass shooting at Brown University in Providence, Rhode Island. #BrownUniversity #Providence #RhodeIsland #University #USNews #BBCNews
item.description: A manhunt is under way after two students were killed and nine others injured in a mass shooting at Brown University in Providence, Rhode Island. #BrownUniversity #Providence #RhodeIsland #University #USNews #BBCNews

item.title: New South Wales Police in Australia said two people are in custody as they respond to a "developing incident" at Bondi Beach. #Australia #NewSouthWalesPolice #BondiBeach #Police #BBCNews
item.description: New South Wales Police in Australia said two people are in custody as they respond to a "developing incident" at Bondi Beach. #Australia #NewSouthWalesPolice #BondiBeach #Police #BBCNews

item.title: Police told the BBC at the scene that multiple people died in the shooting, but have not said how many - two police officers were also injured. #BondiBeach #Australia #NewSouthWalesPolice #News #BBCNews
item.description: Police told the BBC at the scene that multiple people died in the shooting, but have not said how many - two police officers were also injured. #BondiBeach #Australia #NewSouthWalesPolice #News #BBCNews

item.title: At least 12 others were also injured, police said, and two officers were shot during the incident. Tap the link to follow this breaking story live. #Australia #BondiBeach #BBCNews
item.description: At least 12 others were also injured, police said, and two officers were shot during the incident. Tap the link to follow this breaking story live. #Australia #BondiBeach #BBCNews

item.title: An event was being held at Bondi Beach to mark the start of Hanukkah and had more than 1,000 people in attendance, police said. #BondiBeach #Hanukkah #Australia #NSWPolice #BBCNews
item.description: An event was being held at Bondi Beach to mark the start of Hanukkah and had more than 1,000 people in attendance, police said. #BondiBeach #Hanukkah #Australia #NSWPolice #BBCNews

item.title: Twelve people have been killed and 29 taken to hospital following a shooting at Australia's Bondi Beach which targeted the Jewish community. #BondiBeach #Hanukkah #Australia #NSWPolice #BBCNews
item.description: Twelve people have been killed and 29 taken to hospital following a shooting at Australia's Bondi Beach which targeted the Jewish community. #BondiBeach #Hanukkah #Australia #NSWPolice #BBCNews

item.title: New South Wales Police have said 11 people have been killed in a shooting at Bondi Beach targeting the Jewish community, with 29 taken to hospital - including a child. One gunman has also been killed and a second suspect is in critical condition, police s

item.title: Two people were killed and nine others were injured when a gunman opened fire at the university in Providence on Saturday. An earlier order for people on the Brown campus and surrounding areas to shelter has been lifted, but police are still present. #Bro
item.description: Two people were killed and nine others were injured when a gunman opened fire at the university in Providence on Saturday. An earlier order for people on the Brown campus and surrounding areas to shelter has been lifted, but police are still present. #Bro

item.title: Two gunmen who killed 15 people at Bondi Beach in Sydney on Sunday have been named in local media as Sajid Akram, 50, and his son Naveed, 24. #BondiBeach #Sydney #Australia #Police #BBCNews
item.description: Two gunmen who killed 15 people at Bondi Beach in Sydney on Sunday have been named in local media as Sajid Akram, 50, and his son Naveed, 24. #BondiBeach #Sydney #Australia #Police #BBCNews

item.title: According to the family, Ahmed’s condition is stable, and he is awaiting further medical treatment for gunshot wounds to his shoulder and hand sustained during the attack. #Bondi #BondiBeach #Crime #Australia #News #BBCNews
